title: Simulation-Based Learning Design for Enhancing Visual Memory Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of cognitive psychology and visual cognitive processes
context.additional_context: Applying a visual memory training program using VR simulations in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners will be able to identify object shapes and positions with 80% accuracy under various layout conditions (blank screen, frame, grid).
Learners will improve their ability to integrate object and spatial information by 30% over two weeks during visual memory tasks.
Learners will be able to design at least three memory strategies for real job scenarios (e.g., data visualization analysis) by applying principles of visual memory development.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
